title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 471.8 - Motor vehicles of a volunteer fire company or department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 471.8 - Motor vehicles of a volunteer fire company or department

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 504(6)
A motor vehicle owned and operated by any fire company or
fire department, as defined in section three of the Volunteer Firemen's Benefit

Law, is exempt. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
471.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
